definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Tassels on the horns of a dilemma, back to the husbands family and no steps, had to find treasure complex complaint.
sentences.chinese: 流苏进退两难，回婆家又没台阶，只得找宝络诉苦。

sentences.english: Last weekend, my parents took me to my grandma home for a visit.
sentences.chinese: 上周末，我父母带我去了外婆家玩。

sentences.english: In Grandma's in front of a hibiscus tree, there a Graceful.
sentences.chinese: 在外婆家的门前就有一颗婀娜多姿的芙蓉树。

sentences.english: Athar inside with a guy sitting in my grandmas backyard.
sentences.chinese: 阿萨内陪朵索坐在外婆家的后院。

sentences.english: Sometimes I go to Grandma's to play.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我去外婆家去玩。

sentences.english: You will go through the forest. Grandmother’s house is far from here.
sentences.chinese: 外婆家离这儿很远，你得穿过那片树林。

sentences.english: Her husband took her to her home, say, in her day.
sentences.chinese: 丈夫带着女儿去了婆婆家，说好，在婆家玩一天。

sentences.english: The child hurried the cow through the dark forest, toward her grandmother's home.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩赶着牛，匆匆穿过阴暗的树林，向外婆家走去。

sentences.english: Grandmother lived in a hut. The way to the hut was through the forest.
sentences.chinese: 外婆住着一间小屋，去外婆家的路要穿过一片树林。

sentences.english: Then my mother and I took the bus to my grandmother's home.
sentences.chinese: 然后，我妈妈和我搭公共汽车去外婆家。

sentences.english: My mother is guizhou person, since the childhood, I didn't of going to my grandma's.
sentences.chinese: 我的妈妈是贵州人，从小，我就没的去外婆家。

sentences.english: A Sunday, my mother and I went to grandma a guest .
sentences.chinese: 一个星期天，我和妈妈一起到外婆家做客。

sentences.english: In this excursion speaking with the in-laws is what matters.
sentences.chinese: 学习怎么和婆家相处是大事。

sentences.english: Night, sleeping on grandma's pound, can hear the sound of the water.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，睡在外婆家能听到河水的咚咚声。

sentences.english: Then we with the mother moved back to live with my grandmother in Shiga prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 此后我们随妈妈搬回外婆家住的滋贺县。

sentences.english: Meanwhile the wolf ran straight to the grandmother's house and knocked at the door.
sentences.chinese: 就在此时，狼却直接跑到外婆家，敲了敲门。

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
(of a wife) to return to her parental home/(fig.) to return to one's old place, job, school etc
erhua variant of 兒媳婦|儿媳妇[er2 xi2 fu5]
the bridegroom's side/of the bridegroom's family
